entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Cache Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:01 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of snow. High zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 70 percent chance of snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
